Discover how scalar wave therapy provides natural pain relief without medications, dependency, or side effects

Located in Perrysburg, Trinity Natural Health is one of Ohio's few centers offering this cutting-edge technology. If you're looking for natural pain relief, reduced medication needs, or whole-body healing without drugs or invasive procedures, EES may be the solution you've been searching for.

What is Traditional Pain Management?

Pain management is a medical specialty that focuses on reducing and managing chronic pain through pharmaceutical medications, injections, nerve blocks, and sometimes surgical procedures.

How Pain Management Works

Pain management doctors typically prescribe medications (opioids, NSAIDs, muscle relaxers, nerve pain medications) and perform procedures (steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation) to mask or interrupt pain signals. The goal is symptom management rather than healing underlying causes.

Common Uses

  • Chronic back and neck pain
  • Arthritis pain
  • Nerve pain (neuropathy)
  • Post-surgical pain
  • Fibromyalgia

Typical Costs in Perrysburg

Doctor visits: $200-500 per visit

Medications: $50-300/month

Injections/procedures: $500-3,000

Total monthly cost: $300-600+ ongoing

Limitations

  • Drug dependency risks (especially opioids)
  • Side effects (nausea, drowsiness, addiction)
  • Doesn't heal underlying issues
  • Expensive ongoing costs
  • May require invasive procedures

What is Energy Enhancement System (EES)?

Energy Enhancement System is revolutionary scalar wave technology developed by Dr. Sandra Rose Michael after decades of research in integrated biophysics. Unlike pain management which masks symptoms with drugs, EES works at the cellular level to address root causes and promote natural healing without any medications.

How EES Technology Works

EES generates scalar waves that move at superluminal velocity (beyond the speed of light) to:

  • Create coherence in your body's energy field
  • Neutralize harmful electromagnetic fields
  • Promote cellular regeneration
  • Enhance natural healing processes
  • Repair DNA breaks and lengthen telomeres (NASA research)

Scientific Backing

NASA research has shown that scalar energy fields repair DNA breaks and lengthen telomeres, providing scientific validation for EES technology.

When Traditional Pain Management Might Be Appropriate

We believe in honest, transparent information. Traditional pain management may be necessary if:

  • You have acute, severe pain: For emergency situations or severe acute pain, immediate pharmaceutical intervention may be necessary.
  • Post-surgical recovery: Short-term pain medication may be appropriate following surgery as prescribed by your doctor.
  • Your insurance covers medications: If cost is your primary concern and insurance covers your pain medications but not alternative treatments.

Can You Use Both?

Absolutely! Many clients use EES alongside pain management to reduce medication needs. EES can:

  • Help reduce reliance on pain medications over time
  • Address root causes that medications don't heal
  • Minimize side effects by allowing lower medication doses
  • Provide natural healing while you taper off medications

Consider using EES to gradually reduce your medication needs under your doctor's supervision.
